title: House votes to pass $1.3 trillion spending bill
text:
House votes to pass $1.3 trillion spending bill Thursday, March 22, 2018 - 01:48 
The U.S. House of Representatives on Thursday approved a $1.3 trillion spending bill to avert a government shutdown and fund federal agencies through Sept. 30, despite a revolt by fiscal conservatives worried about what they called runaway spending. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The U.S. House of Representatives on Thursday approved a $1.3 trillion spending bill to avert a government shutdown and fund federal agencies through Sept. 30, despite a revolt by fiscal conservatives worried about what they called runaway spending.
